title: Zonas de Vegetação
body: In the article 'Flora' (II-34), a brief account was given about the vegetation zones or regions observed in Madeira, as is the case in all mountainous countries according to the varied climate conditions: We want to draw attention to the pages of *Flora do Arquipélago da Madeira* (216-222) by the distinguished botanist Carlos de Azevedo de Meneses, where the subject is treated with more extensive development.
